Attributes

logger

Classes

InvestmentComponent

Base component from which all components that require an investment

Module Contents

wattadvisor.components.investment_component.logger
class wattadvisor.components.investment_component.InvestmentComponent(**data)

Bases: wattadvisor.components.component.Component

Base component from which all components that require an investment are inherited from.

Parameters:

  • lifespan (float) – Expected lifespan of the component [a]

  • interest_rate (float) – Interest rate to determine annuity factor for investment calculation of the component

lifespan: float
interest_rate: float
property annuity_factor: float

Calculates the annuity factor for investment calculation of the component. Uses class attributes interest rate and expected life span.

Returns:

calculated annuity factor for the component

Return type:

float
